allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive architecture documentation for 6-system design

- CLAUDE.md: Quick reference for the codebase with architecture overview
- docs/SYSTEM_DEFINITIONS.md: Complete definitions for all 6 systems
  - Curation, Character, Prompt Builder, Pipeline Builder, Orchestration, Kernel
  - Public APIs, events, data flows, resolved architectural decisions
- docs/ACTION_PLAN_v2.md: Implementation roadmap mapping current â†’ target
- docs/DEVELOPMENT_PLAN.md: Session-based dev plan for Sonnet agents
  - 18-19 tasks across 7 phases
  - Context budget guidelines, handoff checkpoints, success criteria
  - Session prompt template for agent workflow

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Task 3.2.1: Define per-system configuration schemas

- Create schemas/config-schemas.js with SystemConfigSchemas
- Define config schemas for all 6 systems:
  - CurationConfigSchema (storeSchemas, crudPipelines, ragPipelines, agents, positions)
  - CharacterConfigSchema (directorConfig, voicingDefaults, avatarSettings)
  - PromptBuilderConfigSchema (customTokens, macros, transforms, presetPrompts)
  - PipelineConfigSchema (agents, positions, teams, pipelines)
  - OrchestrationConfigSchema (mode, injectionMappings, executionSettings)
  - KernelConfigSchema (activePreset, uiSettings, apiDefaults)
- Add CompiledPresetSchema for full preset export/import
- Add helper functions: getSchema(), getSystemIds(), detectSystem(), createDefaultConfig()
- Update schemas/systems.js to import and expose config schemas

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Task 3.2.2: Add Kernel Config Manager for centralized configuration

- Add _configManager object with schemas, configs, presets, dirty tracking
- Add registerConfigSchema() for system schema registration
- Add getSystemConfig() / setSystemConfig() / updateSystemConfig()
- Add compilePreset() for creating named presets from all configs
- Add loadCompiledPreset() for applying presets across systems
- Add exportSystemConfig() / importSystemConfig() with auto-detection
- Add _validateConfig() for schema-based validation
- Add _detectSystemFromConfig() for system identification
- Emit config:changed and {systemId}:config:reload events

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(for f in default-pipeline.json quick-pipeline.json standard-pipeline.json)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Task 3.3.1: Migrate existing presets to per-system schema format

- Migrated default-pipeline.json, quick-pipeline.json, standard-pipeline.json
- Updated preset version from 2.0.0 to 2.1.0
- Added per-system configuration structure (curation, character, promptBuilder,
  pipeline, orchestration, kernel)
- Created scripts/migrate-presets.cjs utility for future preset migrations
- Added default configs for all systems
- Pipeline data (agents, positions, teams) moved to systems.pipeline section

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Task 3.4.1: Create tiered presets (basic, standard, comprehensive)

Three tiered presets for different use cases:

- basic.json: 3 agents, 1 phase, injection mode, low API usage
- standard.json: 8 agents, 3 phases, synthesis mode, balanced
- comprehensive.json: 23 agents, 19 phases, 5 gavel points, max quality

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
